dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: 32.7% of Apple's portfolio is in Microsoft? That seems like an incredibly concentrated bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: thirty two point seven percent of Apple's portfolio is in Microsoft? That seems like an incredibly concentrated bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's a huge position, but look at the market value—54.6 billion dollars. It's not exactly a small, risky play.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's a huge position, but look at the market valueminus fifty four point six billion dollars. It's not exactly a small, risky play.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then they've got over 100 billion in Tesla? That's even more concentrated, and Tesla is so volatile.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then they've got over one hundred billion in Tesla? That's even more concentrated, and Tesla is so volatile.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, but that's 40.7% of the Apple portfolio. They clearly have conviction there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, but that's forty point seven percent of the Apple portfolio. They clearly have conviction there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then Google at only 1.4%? That seems almost negligible for such a giant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Google at only one point four percent? That seems almost negligible for such a giant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but they own 100 million shares—that's still 6.5 billion dollars! It's just that their other holdings are so massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but they own one hundred million shares-that's still six point five billion dollars! It's just that their other holdings are so massive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But look at Delta—only 0.01% weight? Why even bother with such a tiny slice?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But look at Delta-only zero point zero one percent weight? Why even bother with such a tiny slice?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, diversification, maybe? Even a billion dollars isn't nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, diversification, maybe? Even a billion dollars isn't nothing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then United Health Group as of January 15th this year—over 10 million shares? That's a huge healthcare bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then United Health Group as of January fifteenth this year-over ten million shares? That's a huge healthcare bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and it's worth 26.5 billion. They're not messing around with these picks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and it's worth twenty six point five billion. They're not messing around with these picks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But some of these weights are all over the place—Netflix at 5.2%, Amazon under 1%... it feels inconsistent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But some of these weights are all over the place-Netflix at five point two percent, Amazon under one percent... it feels inconsistent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or maybe it's strategic? They're overweight on what they believe in most, like Tesla and Microsoft.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or maybe it's strategic? They're overweight on what they believe in most, like Tesla and Microsoft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I guess, but seeing Verizon and AT&T with such tiny allocations... it's just surprising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess, but seeing Verizon and A T&T with such tiny allocations... it's just surprising.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, those are older telecom giants—maybe Apple sees more growth elsewhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, those are older telecom giants-maybe Apple sees more growth elsewhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fair point. Still, that concentration risk makes me nervous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair point. Still, that concentration risk makes me nervous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For most people yeah, but when you're managing hundreds of billions, you play by different rules.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For most people yeah, but when you're managing hundreds of billions, you play by different rules.
